analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ShortOrder.claimDonations (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#244-270):
	External calls:
	- Token(tokenUser[0]).transfer(admin,orderRecord[tokenUser[1]][orderHash].shortBalance[tokenUser[0]]) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#260-261)
	External calls sending eth:
	- admin.transfer(safeAdd(orderRecord[tokenUser[1]][orderHash].coupon,orderRecord[tokenUser[1]][orderHash].balance)) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#258-260)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#261)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#261-264)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#264)

Reentrancy in ShortOrder.exerciseLong (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#201-244):
	External calls:
	- Token(tokenUser[0]).transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#224)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(couponAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#224)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#224-225)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#225-226)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#226-229)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#230)

Reentrancy in ShortOrder.tokenFulfillmentDeposit (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#105-133):
	External calls:
	- Token(tokenUser[0]).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#127)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#127-130)
	- orderRecord (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#132)

ShortOrder.tokenFulfillmentDeposit (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#105-133) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(tokenUser[0]).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#127)

ShortOrder.exerciseLong (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#201-244) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(tokenUser[0]).transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#224)

ShortOrder.claimDonations (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#244-270) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(tokenUser[0]).transfer(admin,orderRecord[tokenUser[1]][orderHash].shortBalance[tokenUser[0]]) (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#260-261)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#42)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#43)
Token.totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#5-7) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#9-11) should be declared external
Token.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#15-17) should be declared external
Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#22-24) should be declared external
Token.approve (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#28-30) should be declared external
Token.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#33-35) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol:

Function 'ShortOrder.ShortOrder' (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#101-105) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_admin' of ShortOrder.changeAdmin (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#105) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_price' of ShortOrder.returnAmount (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol) is not in mixedCase

Token.decimals (/unique_contracts/0x0bb622a8c564bdc98e8f40f23e5077cd4a8699ea.sol#42) is never used in Token
